story_29_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Good luck, Lear! We’ll be rooting for you!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You made us wait a whole day for this, so you
better not lose!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Hear that? Everyone’s cheerin’ for Master Lear!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
That’s, like, never happened before!
Right, Sawyer?!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I...I’m not crying! Someone must be cooking onions
or something...
story_29_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: S-stop this nonsense, both of you! We’re in public!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Heh! You’re one to talk, Master Lear! You’re, like,
totally blushing right now!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: N-no, I am not! Would you stop teasing me?!
story_29_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
A-as for the rest of you all, don’t miss a moment
of the action today! I promise to show you a battle
you’ll never forget!
